name: DNS Capital

recent_activities.headline: Lithko Contracting, LLC Announces Asset Acquisition of Full-Tilt
recent_activities.description: Full-Tilt, specializing in tilt-up construction, was acquired by DNS Capital, enhancing DNS's construction expertise.
recent_activities.full_text: Lithko Contracting, LLC (Lithko) is excited to announce its recent asset acquisition of Full-Tilt Constructors (Full-Tilt)...

recent_activities.headline: DNS Capital Announces Acquisition of IMI Holding Corp.
recent_activities.description: DNS Capital has acquired IMI Holding Corp., the parent company of Industrial Magnetics, Inc., to strengthen its manufacturing portfolio.
recent_activities.full_text: DNS Capital today announced the acquisition of IMI Holding Corp. (IMI Holdings)...

recent_activities.headline: FSG acquires controlling interest in Penguins - DNS Capital
recent_activities.description: DNS Capital participated in the acquisition of a controlling interest in the Pittsburgh Penguins, subject to NHL approval.
recent_activities.full_text: The deal, which is subject to approval by the National Hockey League (NHL) Board of Governors, is expected to close before the end of the year.

key_transactions.description: Acquisition of Industrial Magnetics, enhancing DNS Capital's portfolio in manufacturing.
DNS Capital led a significant investment in Sierra Space, a tech company focused on space exploration.

strategy_insights: DNS Capital focuses on long-term investments in sectors such as manufacturing, technology, and real estate. Their strategy reflects a commitment to diversifying their portfolio while supporting innovative companies.
leadership_changes: No notable leadership changes reported in the past 10 years.
